analysis.key_quote: I oppose the reinstatement of Schedule F, Docket (OPM-2025-0004), 2025-06904. Changing positions to "at will" sets a precedent for political appointees that will be severely underqualified and will undermine various federal laws set in place to protect the American people.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reinstatement of Schedule F and raises concerns about the implications of politicizing federal positions, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
